description: Passionate about frontend web development, user interface, graphic design. Have an understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and comfortable with library such as React.js and TailwindCSS. Driven to build seamless and visually stunning web experiences.

Continuosly trying improve my skills, and staying up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in the fast-pace environment of frontend development. Currently on an exciting journey to explore the vast world of technology and its limitless possibilities.
